attributes.action: Employ a petition typist competent to correct spelling and grammar
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reading the 8000 petitions currently on line I find nearly all are pervaded by similar spelling errors with not a few grammar errors. Sometimes these distort the meaning out of recognition, e.g. there, their, they're. A new petition typist please

rejection.details: Comments on petitions should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
